content: you will now have two loops on your hook yarn over and pull through both loops you will have two loops on your hook pull through both of these to complete your stitch how to hold your yarn to the back how to change colors have your back color to the side once you have two loops on your hook pick up the second color than complete the single_crochet by pulling through both the first color loops with the second color graph http //friendship-bracelets net/alpha_pattern php id=50921 here is the link for the graph i used that i based the hat off of
